Description: The Pin component is a button that can be visible or hidden, pinned or unpinned.

template.description: The HTML template for the pin component.

icon.description: The main container of the pin component, styled as a button.

svg(pinned).description: The SVG icon used for the 'pinned' mode.

svg(unpinned).description: The SVG icon used for the 'unpinned' mode.

visible.description: Indicates whether the pin is visible. Visibility is assumed by default; absence of the attribute is equivalent to 'yes'.

status.description: Indicates the current status of the pin.

hide.description: Sets the 'visible' state to 'no', hiding the pin.

show.description: Sets the 'visible' state to 'yes', making the pin visible.

pin.description: Sets the 'status' to 'pinned', pin the pin.

unpin.description: Sets the 'status' to 'unpinned', unpin the pin.

onhide.description: Triggered when the pin is hidden (state 'visible' changes to 'no').

onshow.description: Triggered when the pin becomes visible (state 'visible' changes to 'yes').

onpin.description: Triggered when the pin is pinned (state 'status' changes to 'pinned').

onunpin.description: Triggered when the pin is unpinned (state 'status' changes to 'unpinned').

on.description: Triggered on any pin lifecycle event. Receives the same event object and payload as the specific event that was emitted.

click.description: Toggle pin button when icon clicked.

hover.description: Change button appearance when hovered over the icon. This is a visual-only gesture implemented via CSS and does not emit runtime events.
